text: In NiftiMapsMasker, some people want to prevent any overlap. Such option can be useful. On the other hand, some people may want to allow overlapping spheres in NiftiSpheresMasker.
title: Add `allow_overlap` in NiftiMapsMasker, NiftiSpheresMasker
clean_text: In niftimapsmask peopl want prevent overlap such option use On hand peopl may want allow overlap sphere niftispheresmask
